### Creating new vectors 

```{r}
vec_a <- c(1, 6)

vec_b <- c(2, 4)
  
```

#### Using R to check our calculations made by hand 

```{r}
vec_c <- vec_a + vec_b #right!

vec_d <- vec_b - vec_a #right!

vec_e <- 4 * vec_a #right!

vec_a %*% vec_b #right!

```
